name: Sheriff Woody
description: Sheriff Woody Pride is a 1950s old traditional pull string cowboy doll, and Andy's favorite toy.

name: Buzz Lightyear
description: Previously known as Tinny and Lunar Larry, Buzz Lightyear is a modern-day "space ranger" action figure.

name: Jessie
description: Jessie is a cowgirl doll, and part of the Woody's Round Up gang.

name: Hamm the Piggy Bank
description: Hamm is a wisecracking realist piggy bank with a cork in his belly in place of a stopper
